infos.value: If so, then you must respond.
It doesn't look like Lady Machérie is anywhere to be found.
And yet you heard her voice all the same...
A revelation from the gods, perhaps?
Lord Mont, the wave of enemy forces has stopped!
Seems we've earned a brief respite, eh?
My prince, it's time to make a choice.
Yes. We'll enter the castle and discover Father's true intent.
